definitions.definition: The act of turning or whirling , especially around a fixed axis or centre ; a circular or spiral motion ; rotation .

subdefinitions.definition: A rotation around an axis which is not the centre of rotational symmetry ; an eccentric or off-centre rotation.

definitions.definition: One of the whorls of a spiral univalve shell .
The arrangement of convolutions of gyri in the cerebral cortex of the brain .

main_definition: ( also figuratively ) The act of turning or whirling , especially around a fixed axis or centre ; a circular or spiral motion ; rotation .
secondary_definitions: ( conchology ) One of the whorls of a spiral univalve shell .
( neurology ) The arrangement of convolutions of gyri in the cerebral cortex of the brain .
